revised_title: Spherical Harmonics and Tesseral Functions: Applications and Integrals
tldr: The author presents a new method for reducing a function of spherical coordinates to a series of spherical harmonics, focusing on definite integrals and tesseral functions. This method simplifies calculations and allows for the determination of coefficients independently of higher-degree terms. Applications include expressing constant quantities over a sphere and solving integrals involving tesseral functions.
